name: The Academy - San Francisco @ McAteer
description: High School serves 9-12 grades - ESTIMATED ENROLLMENT: 360 - NEIGHBORHOOD: Diamond Heights, Glen Park, Portola - SCHOOL MEALS: Breakfast, Lunch, After School Supper - View menus at sfusd.edu/menus. - SCHOOL CODE: 832 The Academy-SF is co-located with Ruth Asawa School of the Arts at the former McAteer campus, however, the Academy is a separate school located on the first floor of the Main Building.
